text: As a man thinketh in his heart, so is he.
author: James Allen

text: A thought, when held with faith, seeks its own.
author: W. D. Wattles

text: See the thing, feel it as real, and it will be so.
author: Charles F. Haanel

text: Your attention is the architect of your days.
author: Anonymous

text: Water the ideas you want to harvest.
author: Anonymous

text: Belief is a lever disguised as a story you tell yourself.
author: Anonymous

text: You move toward the pictures you hold most often.
author: Anonymous

text: Assume the stance; the path appears.
author: Anonymous

text: Choose words that build rooms you want to live in.
author: Anonymous

text: Expect good, prepare well, and act now.
author: Anonymous

text: Vision without a calendar is a wish.
author: Anonymous

text: What you repeat, you become.
author: Anonymous

text: Attention is accelerationâ€”aim it.
author: Anonymous

text: Imagine clearly, then behave accordingly.
author: Anonymous

text: Hold the outcome lightly; hold the work daily.
author: Anonymous

text: Name the future and walk toward it.
author: Anonymous

text: Let your schedule reveal your belief.
author: Anonymous

text: Speak as if you respect your dreams.
author: Anonymous

text: See it, script it, ship it.
author: Anonymous

text: Act the part until the part fits.
author: Anonymous
